scripts.start: npm run build && npm run app
scripts.dev: RADIO_DEBUG=1 node --watch server/server.mjs & npm run hot
scripts.dev:static: npm run hot:static & python -m http.server --directory pages 8040
scripts.hot:static: cp index.html pages/ && cp styles.css pages/ && esbuild src/Comps/App.Client.tsx --bundle --define:process.env.NODE_ENV="'production'" --loader:.mjs=js --minify --outfile=./pages/index.js --watch=forever
scripts.build:static: esbuild src/Comps/App.Client.tsx --bundle --define:process.env.NODE_ENV="'production'" --loader:.mjs=js --minify --outfile=./pages/index.js && cp index.html pages/ && cp styles.css pages/
